meanings.sent1: Her performance in the play was outstanding.
meanings.sent2: The outstanding student received a scholarship.
meanings.sent3: The outstanding cake at the party was devoured in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The outstanding sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The outstanding achievement will be remembered for years to come.

meanings.sent1: He still has outstanding bills to pay.
meanings.sent2: The outstanding balance on the account needs to be cleared.
meanings.sent3: The outstanding laundry piled up in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent4: The outstanding debt weighed heavily on his mind.
meanings.sent5: The outstanding invoice was accidentally misplaced.

meanings.sent1: The outstanding feature of the building was its unique architecture.
meanings.sent2: Her outstanding red dress caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The outstanding hat she wore made her easy to spot in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The outstanding mountain peak dominated the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The outstanding landmark guided them through the city.
